<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sense Good](/Feats.aspx?ID=1679) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[tenets of evil](/Tenets.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

The presence of goodness sickens you with its saccharine self-righteousness. You detect holy creatures as a [vague sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=2408), similar to humans’ sense of smell. A holy creature using a disguise or otherwise trying to hide its presence attempts a Deception check against your Perception DC to hide its holiness from you. If the creature succeeds at its Deception check, it is then temporarily immune to your Sense Good for 1 day.
name: Sense Good
